column5: Your jigs work.               But seriously, I did land this nice chromer on a jig.   Thanks again for the jigs.  I'll probably be making future orders.
did you snag that sucker on top of his head lol hahaha I think those suckers are the ugliest fish swimming around, nice bow tho.
The float ripped under, so I can only assume he hit it. The thing even jumped!
id jump too if i had a hook in my skull!  nice trout...and whistlin troot too
The IQ level of that sucker just dropped 2 points  Well done on the bow
Good job buddy!!! I got one last week on a purple with purple ice dubbing collar.
